main event: A witness observed a white object in the sky near Las Cruces, New Mexico on 23 July 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared to be slowly climbing at a great rate while abruptly changing direction., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes., There is suspicion regarding the report with no conclusive evidence to support the claim of a flying object., The conclusions indicated it was probably a balloon or could possibly be astronomical in nature., A separate sighting report from 8 August 1962 documented an object that hovered and moved in an easterly direction.
sighted object: a white object in the sky
witness description: the witness observed the object visually for 5 minutes
